title: Bug 103963: Missing friendly error message when no data is available for a series
OB: When there is no data for series, the software does not display a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column without any data. 3. Observe the lack of a friendly error message.
